00026 #ifndef __BLI_BITMAP_H__
00027 #define __BLI_BITMAP_H__
00028 
00029 typedef unsigned int* BLI_bitmap;
00030 
00031 /* warning: the bitmap does not keep track of its own size or check
00032  * for out-of-bounds access */
00033 
00034 /* internal use */
00035 /* 2^5 = 32 (bits) */
00036 #define BLI_BITMAP_POWER 5
00037 /* 0b11111 */
00038 #define BLI_BITMAP_MASK 31
00039 
00040 /* number of blocks needed to hold '_tot' bits */
00041 #define BLI_BITMAP_NUM_BLOCKS(_tot) \
00042     (((_tot) >> BLI_BITMAP_POWER) + 1)
00043 
00044 /* size (in bytes) used to hold '_tot' bits */
00045 #define BLI_BITMAP_SIZE(_tot) \
00046     (BLI_BITMAP_NUM_BLOCKS(_tot) * sizeof(unsigned int))
00047 
00048 /* allocate memory for a bitmap with '_tot' bits; free
00049  *  with MEM_freeN() */
00050 #define BLI_BITMAP_NEW(_tot, _alloc_string) \
00051     ((BLI_bitmap)MEM_callocN(BLI_BITMAP_SIZE(_tot), \
00052                              _alloc_string))
00053 
00054 /* get the value of a single bit at '_index' */
00055 #define BLI_BITMAP_GET(_bitmap, _index) \
00056     ((_bitmap)[(_index) >> BLI_BITMAP_POWER] & \
00057      (1 << ((_index) & BLI_BITMAP_MASK)))
00058 
00059 /* set the value of a single bit at '_index' */
00060 #define BLI_BITMAP_SET(_bitmap, _index) \
00061     ((_bitmap)[(_index) >> BLI_BITMAP_POWER] |= \
00062      (1 << ((_index) & BLI_BITMAP_MASK)))
00063 
00064 /* clear the value of a single bit at '_index' */
00065 #define BLI_BITMAP_CLEAR(_bitmap, _index) \
00066     ((_bitmap)[(_index) >> BLI_BITMAP_POWER] &= \
00067      ~(1 << ((_index) & BLI_BITMAP_MASK)))
00068 
00069 /* set or clear the value of a single bit at '_index' */
00070 #define BLI_BITMAP_MODIFY(_bitmap, _index, _set) \
00071     do { \
00072         if(_set) \
00073             BLI_BITMAP_SET(_bitmap, _index); \
00074         else \
00075             BLI_BITMAP_CLEAR(_bitmap, _index); \
00076     } while(0)
00077 
00078 /* resize bitmap to have space for '_tot' bits */
00079 #define BLI_BITMAP_RESIZE(_bitmap, _tot) \
00080     (_bitmap) = MEM_reallocN(_bitmap, BLI_BITMAP_SIZE(_tot))
00081 
00082 #endif
